      • setDictionarySize

        public void setDictionarySize​(int DictBitSize)
        Sets the dictionary size that will be used at compression time
        Parameters:
        DictBitSize - maximum size in bytes of the input stream (use 2^31-1 if unknown or default), this value its needed for decompress
